ChunkText: make sure that all fields are completed on the first four pages and that the form includes all required signatures student signs on page 1 and employer signs on pages 2 and 4 .
ContextBefore: if you submit the request more than 90 days in advance, we will not process it until the window opens. to dos: complete the i-983 training form with your employer.
ContextAfter: download a draft snapshot of your form i-765 application here see below electronic filing help for instructions on using the uscis online application system submit a complete stem OPT request in the isss portal upload the following: form i-983 training plan with all required signatures draft snapshot of your form i-765 copy of official transcript or diploma the transcript should clearly state your program major and the date when the degree was conferred or awarded.
